snippet: The released prisoner, Herman Wallace, one of three men convicted in the 1972 fatal stabbing of an Angola prison guard in Louisiana, had served decades in solitary confinement.
abstract: The released prisoner, Herman Wallace, one of three men convicted in the 1972 fatal stabbing of an Angola prison guard in Louisiana, had served decades in solitary confinement.

headline.main: Another 'Angola 3' Prisoner, With Cancer, Is Released
